mapper.select: select fl.fund_no as fund_no, i.pname as pname, fm.mname as mname, fl.funddate as funddate, fm.mcost * fl.fundcount as fcost, fl.payment as payment, fl.evidence as evidence, a.id as id from item i join fundmenu fm on (i.pro_no = fm.pro_no) join fundlist fl on (fm.mno = fl.mno) join account a on (fl.ano = a.ano) where fl.funstatus = '취소요청중'
